job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pstrongMLOps EngineerstrongppstrongEnergy Technology StartupstrongppstrongUSA RemotestrongppbrppbrppA Series A Charlottesvillebased national leader in proven vehicletogrid V2G systems is growing and searching for a Forecasting Engineer They are on a mission to combat climate change increase energy resilience and reduce energy costs by leveraging electric vehicle batteries Now is the time to get involved grow with the team and take part in the exciting energy transition to help transform the Worlds futureppbrppbrppResponsibilitiespp Help design and implement our machine learning platformpp Build tooling for running batch experimentspp Build tooling for analyzing experiments eg feature importancepp Build tooling for assessing production model performance eg model driftpp Help develop and productionize algorithmsppbrppbrppRequirementspp Experience building machine learning platformspp Object Oriented Programming experiencepp Python development experiencepp Experience with distributed services andor messaging systemsppbrppbrppBenefitspp Competitive salary at recently funded highgrowth businesspp Opportunity to work with like minded people on exciting projectspp Company culture of trust freedom and recognitionppbrppbrpp Sounds like you Please click on the Easy Apply button You can also send your resume directly to titoayantundestorm4com or message me directlyppbrppbrppemIf you have any extra requirements to support your application then please just add a note along with your CV to let us knowemp
